title: So Many Me (2014) - 3DM
description:

These clones possess all sorts of fun abilities that can be used to solve puzzles throughout the game. As you progress further through FiloÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s adventure, you will find a variety of new types of clones. Understanding and harnessing their unique powers are key to your success. 

FiloÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s myriad of adventures take him to a whimsical universe. It features a colorful art genre filled with adorable characters in their worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s mysterious environment.

Key Features:
Discover new transformational abilities as you progress through each chapter. Learning to master these forms and using them in sequence, is key to solving the gameÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s many puzzles. 
FiloÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s endless adventures take you to a wondrous world of color filled with delightfully, intriguing characters. 
Ride massive and powerful creatures. Utilize their unusual abilities to solve special puzzles and to smash through pesky obstacles on your way to the goal! 
Boss monsters, each with their own distinct characteristics, will try to eliminate you. Challenge and overcome them. 
Earn your rewards when you have solved the puzzles! Dozens of adorable costumes, ancient artifacts, and bonus levels are waiting for you!
